headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GIBBONS, BARBARA HALLORAN

lead_paragraph: GIBBONS--Barbara Halloran, Syndicated columnist ("The Slim Gourmet") Barbara Halloran Gibbons died March 26, 2014 in Dallas, TX. Born in Newark, NJ, she lived in New Jersey through the mid 1990s, and wrote the three times weekly low calorie cooking column featured in over 200 newspapers throughout the 1970s-'90s, as well as a similar monthly column in Family Circle magazine. The author of 16 cookbooks, including two Tastemaker Award winners, she was also a travel photographer and writer and a member of the Travel Journalists Guild. She was the wife of the late WI Gibbons and partner for 30 years to Gerald T. Gallagher, mother of Susan Gibbons Gillespie of New Jersey and grandmother to four: Daniel and Isaac Gillespie, both of New York, Christopher Gillespie of Washington, DC and Benjamin Gillespie, of Omaha, NE. Memorial Service at 3pm, April 6, at Trinity Covenant Church, 343 East Cedar St., Livingston, NJ.
